TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

Docs.summary: Represents controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements. The children of this control support and are organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed by row and column.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern> does not support active manipulation of a grid; the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern> control pattern is required for this functionality.
See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients) for examples of controls that may support this control pattern.

Docs.related: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients
Implementing the UI Automation Grid Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As GridPattern.GridPatternInformation

Docs.summary: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .
Docs.value: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>. Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation>.

Docs.exception: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ColumnCountProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.
## Examples In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of UI Automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions.
[!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As GridPattern.GridPatternInformation

Docs.summary: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .
Docs.value: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values. If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetItem(int32 row, int32 column) cil managed
Public Function GetItem (row As Integer, column As Integer) As AutomationElement

Docs.param: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.
Docs.summary: Retrieves an that represents the specified cell.
Docs.returns: An that represents the retrieved cell.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0).
If a cell is empty, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is still returned in order to support retrieval of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ContainingGrid%2A> property for that cell. This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array as shown here.
![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.") Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates
## Examples In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent> listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus change event.
[!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

Docs.exception:
Either the requested row or column coordinate is less than zero.
-or-
The requested row coordinate is larger than the or the column coordinate is larger than the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.
The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
## Examples In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern> control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element.
[!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly RowCountProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPatternIdentifiers>.
## Examples In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. This example retrieves the UI Automation elements that support <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern> but currently have only one item in the tree.
[!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#100)]
